DateTooBig: Search can be made only for 45 days from now, or use the mode 'all the days'
DateUpTooLater: The search can be performed starting from the current time
EditFavoriteMessageError: Keep at least one route that would be able to edit
ErrorUpdate: not found the last request, or there was an error loading
IncorrectInput: One or both of the item does not exist, recheck the input
InternetConnectionError: Access to the Internet, check the connection!
LanguageChanged: Successfully updated language! Please log onto the app!
NoPlace: No place. Specify the box office
NotifyMessage: Please select your desired station, and then click the button to delete the selected
PointsIsInCorrect: One or both stations are not introduced
RouteIsIncorect: The route is not found, check the input field stations!
SearchError: A problem has occurred while loading data on prolonged failure, please notify us
SpecifyDate: Check the date to display information about the places
TrainsNotFound: Trains on the date of origin is not found
DeleteDataNotification: All saved data will be deleted (Saved Routes / last request)
